content: - 5 and 6 - 10 need to have the same final dimensions including the edges of clue 11 so that everything fits seamlessly together * the pattern uses 12 colors but can be made with more or fewer if preferred * stacked single crochets stsc count as a stitch throughout the pattern you can choose to use a chain 2 at the beginning of row/rounds instead of a stacked single_crochet if using the chain 2 at the beginning of row it does not count as a stitch throughout the pattern unless otherwise indicated first double_crochet will go into stitch containing chain 2 * the pattern includes written instructions as well as charts for each clue * for instructions on how to work a magic_ring check out this video 10 *designed by johanna huck* you ll receive a digital file only instantly downloadable as a pdf and won t be shipped anything please allow a few minutes for the download link to be emailed to you if the email doesn t arrive within a few minutes just log into your account on our site and you ll see your completed orders from there you ll find the download link enjoy your crocheting chandi new read about our pattern download process here 11 * the way i see it if you want the rainbow you gotta put up with the rain dolly parton* 1 https //www expressionfiberarts com/ 2 https //www ravelry com/discuss/expression-fiber-arts/4388854 3 https //www expressionfiberarts com/faqs/ 4 https //expressionfiberarts com/categories/sport/wishglow-sport html 5 https //expressionfiberarts com/products/arcoiris-enamel-pin-2026-mcal html 6 https //expressionfiberarts com/products/allegory-wishglow-sport html 7 https //expressionfiberarts com/categories/sport/wishglow-sport html 8 https //expressionfiberarts com/categories/sport/wishglow-sport html 9 https //blog expressionfiberarts com/2026/01/07/join-us-for-our-2026-mystery-crochet-along-mcal-arcoiris/ 10 https //youtu be/zx8qcizyuv8 11 https //www expressionfiberarts com/faqs/
